<b>Description:</b> <br>


Welcome to my website. I complete my PhD requirements in Economics at the University of Ottawa, Canada. <br>
I am in the job market this year and available for interviews.<br>

<b>Research interests:</b> <br>

My research interests are in international economics, macroeconomics, and applied econometrics.<br> 
I would also like to work in the fields related to monetary economics.
